mapper.insert: insert into zh_used_info_his ( his_id, load_id, target_id, target_type, src_status, dest_status, created_by, created_time )values ( #{hisId}, #{loadId}, #{targetId}, #{targetType}, #{srcStatus}, #{destStatus}, #{createdBy}, now() )
mapper.update: update zh_used_info_his set his_id=#{hisId}, load_id=#{loadId}, target_id=#{targetId}, target_type=#{targetType}, src_status=#{srcStatus}, dest_status=#{destStatus}, created_by=#{createdBy}, created_time=#{createdTime} where his_id=#{hisId}

update zh_used_info_his
his_id=#{hisId},
load_id=#{loadId},
target_id=#{targetId},
target_type=#{targetType},
src_status=#{srcStatus},
dest_status=#{destStatus},
created_by=#{createdBy},
created_time=#{createdTime}
where his_id=#{hisId}
mapper.select: select his_id, load_id, target_id, target_type, src_status, dest_status, created_by, created_time from zh_used_info_his where his_id=#{hisId}
select his_id, load_id, target_id, target_type, src_status, dest_status, created_by, created_time from zh_used_info_his where his_id=#{hisId}
